title: How to submit your IGNOU assignments online for June 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: DYNAMIC TUTORIALS AND SERVICES is a leading tutorial for Commerce and Arts Stream in Upper Assam in both online and offline mode. We are now going to provide complete notes and video classes for BPP, BCOM AND MCOM in this website. In this section we will provide you complete notes for BPP, BCOM AND MCOM of IGNOU. Visit this page frequently for latest updates. IGNOU ASSIGNMENTS ONLINE SUBMISSION – LAST DATE APRIL 30’ 2020 As all of we know that the whole world and humanity is in danger due to COVID-19. Maximum countries are locked down at present and our country also locked down till April 14. By the reason of which it is not possible for the students of IGNOU to submit the assignments physically at the regional centres of IGNOU. Also there is a fear that physical submission of assignment can increase Corona Virus infection. Considering these points, IGNOU in his notification dated 25 March informs that students desiring to appear in June’ 2020 exam can submit their assignments online to their respective regional centres. Also last date of submission of exam form is extended upto 30th April without late fine. How to submit assignments in online mode? Step 1: Write the assignment in your own writing following the guidelines given in the assignments. (Note: Assignment should not be typed on computer) Step 2: Scan the handwritten assignment using mobile phones. Following points must be taken into consideration which scanning Hand Written Assignments: 1. there must be one pdf file for one assignment. if there are 5 questions in an assignment, then answer of all the question should be scanned into one single pdf file. 2. first page must contain the following details: a) Name of the student: b) Enrollment Number: c) Regional centre code: d) Study centre code: e) Programme code: f) Course Code(s) of attached assignments: g) mobile number: h) Email id: 3. last date of submitting assignment is april 30. 4. First page of pdf file of each assignment must include the student details as mentioned above. 5. Assignments question papers are available on the official website of ignou. Step 3: Submit the assignment on the email address provided by your respective regional centre. Contact your Regional centre for email id in which assignments are to be submitted. So you have to check your regional centre website and follow the whole instruction and then send your assignments. You have to make a pdf of assignment for submitting it online. Note: due to huge amount of assignment are submitted to the ignou, therefore email id is not working in many cases. And a new email id is provided by ignou. For more information.
